panels.title: Cluster disk read and written bytes
Nodes network read and written bytes
Nodes disk read and written bytes
Nodes network read and written bytes

targets.expr:
topk(10, sum(
  rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{id!="", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", cluster="", namespace=~".*-tenant"}[5m])
  +
  rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{id!="", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", cluster="", namespace=~".*-tenant"}[5m])
) by (namespace))

panels.title: Tekton Pipelines controller tasks runs throttle count

panels.description: In each bucket, we have 4 leases. These leases should be distributed over more than 1 pods. If they are not, we might need Infra team intervention.

custom.axisLabel: Number of pods the bucket is on
